mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_identification, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone, user_email) values(#{userIdentification}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select user_id from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification}
select user_id from tbl_user where user_Email = #{userEmail}
select user_id from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification} and user_password = #{userPassword}
